column4: do u have the newest version of flash? refer to the adobe website to check

Honestly, it doesnt completely malfunction.  Its only when Im trying to use my webcam in a flash based chatroom. Everything shows up pixely whereas other non-flash webcam  tools show things crystal clear  (such as Google Talk's in-browser webcam chat)
Well, I figure it is something with Flash but I dont know what.  I have tried 10.3 d162 and 10.1 r53 with no success.
